author: dlr
msg: Simplify arguments passed to do_merge().
* subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(do_merge): Rename the CALLBACK_BATON parameter to MERGE_B, and
change its data type from void * to struct merge_cmd_baton * (since
that's the only data type which is ever passed to this function),
and adjust uses accordingly.  Remove the CTX parameter, which is
already available via the MERGE_B parameter, and create a local
variable of the same name.
(svn_client_merge2, svn_client_merge_peg2): Drop context argument to
do_merge().

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Partially fix directory/multi-file
'merge' implementation's handling of reverts.
calculate_merge_ranges() still doesn't handle reverts, but is stubbed
out in preparation for addition of such handling.
* subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(do_merge): Make use of the local "is_revert" flag when calculating
the "start" and "end" values for the svn_merge_range_t used to
describe the revision range for the requested merge (which must be
equal for ranges containing a single revision).  When manipulating
the editor and reporter, translate from svn_merge_range_t "start" and
"end" to account for the exclusivity of its low value (indicated by
this operation being a merge vs. revert).

author: xsteve
msg: Remove a repository lock from the display after a commit.
* trunk/contrib/client-side/psvn/psvn.el:
(svn-status-line-info->repo-locked): Corrected documentation
(svn-status-line-info->set-repo-locked): New function
(svn-status-annotate-status-buffer-entry): Reset the locked info
after a commit

author: sussman
msg: Add svnmerge.py metadata for my feature branch.

author: maxb
msg: SWIG bindings include tidying.
[in subversion/bindings/swig/]
* include/svn_types.swg: Remove redundant duplicate inclusions.
* core.i, svn_client.i, svn_delta.i, svn_fs.u, svn_ra.i, svn_repos.i, svn_wc.i:
Factor out common includes...
* include/svn_global.swg: ...to here.
Move all-language content to top of file.
